main.name: Venkatesh Morpoju
main.bio: Experienced Full Stack Developer skilled in ReactJS, Spring Boot, MongoDB, and more. I've contributed to projects at Sephora, Agricultural Sciences UGA, and Quanteon Solutions, focusing on performance optimization and secure platform development.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

about.bio: Experienced Full Stack Developer skilled in ReactJS, Spring Boot, MongoDB, and more. I've contributed to projects at Sephora, Agricultural Sciences UGA, and Quanteon Solutions, focusing on performance optimization and secure platform development.
about.tutor: I am a passionate tutor who loves to share my knowledge in a simple and explainable way. I believe that making complex topics easy to understand is key to helping students succeed, and I enjoy seeing them grow and learn.

education.school: Sreenidhi Institute of Science and Technology

work.title: Software Engineer (contract)
work.description: Developed and implemented new UI screens using React with a Spring Boot backend for BlueYonder WMS, integrating via iframes, enhancing user interactions with a comprehensive knowledge of Restful Services. Migrated JDA WMS backend code (MOCA) to Java with Spring Boot, incorporating single-token authentication methodologies and aligning with Restful Services to facilitate seamless operation of React screens.

work.title: Software Engineer (contract)
work.description: Contributed to FlowScript.AI by developing using NodeJS and ReactTS, reducing complexity in web app creation via intuitive English prompts while maintaining a strong understanding of the project scope and alignments with business needs. Onboarded over 1,000 users to the pre-launch platform, showcasing effective stakeholder collaboration.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Developed user interfaces for InAppBI, improving query response times by 15%. Utilized AWS Elastic Load Balancing (ELB) for traffic distribution across EC2 instances, enhancing application availability during high query loads by 30%. Developed SimpleFin for small-scale businesses to track expenses, and MindSpace for online patient-doctor consultations.

work.title: Mean Stack Developer
work.description: Developed a centralized notification system using NodeJS, reducing email and SMS delivery times by 20%. Upgraded the Storyteller tool with Google Maps integration, providing a more visual and informative experience.

work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description: Designed and developed the All-in-One portal using Angular 4 for frontend and PHP for backend. This platform empowered users to consolidate and manage their information efficiently.
